articles.author: Nicole Jao
articles.title: Oil edges lower after US data deflates near term rate cut expectations - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices edged down on Friday and posted a third straight weekly loss as investors weighed OPEC+ reassurances against the latest U.S. jobs data that lowered expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates soon.

articles.author: Beth Kindig
articles.title: Prediction: Nvidia Stock Will Reach $10 Trillion Market Cap By 2030 - Forbes
articles.description: Nvidia stock will reach a $10 trillion market cap by 2030 or sooner through a rapid product road map, impenetrable moat from CUDA, and due to being an AI systems company
articles.content: Nvidia has a market cap of $3 trillion today. We believe Nvidia will reach a $10 trillion market cap by 2030 or sooner through a rapid product road map, its impenetrable moat from the CUDA software p… [+32615 chars]
